Sentencas: A novel reactor of a natural gas (NG) fueled, 1 kW net power solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system with anode off gas recirculation (AOGR) is experimentally investigated.
Titulo: Reforming results of a novel radial reactor for a solid oxide fuel cell system with anode off-gas recirculation

Sentencas: The reactor operates as pre-reformer, is of the type radial reactor with centrifugal z-flow, has the shape of a hollow cylinder with a volume of approximately 1 L and is equipped with two different precious metal wire-mesh catalyst packages as well as with an internal electric heater.
Titulo: Reforming results of a novel radial reactor for a solid oxide fuel cell system with anode off-gas recirculation

Sentencas: Reforming investigations of the reactor are done stand-alone but as if the reactor would operate within the total SOFC system with AOGR.
Titulo: Reforming results of a novel radial reactor for a solid oxide fuel cell system with anode off-gas recirculation

Sentencas: For the tests presented here it is assumed that the SOFC system runs on pure CH4 instead of NG.
Titulo: Reforming results of a novel radial reactor for a solid oxide fuel cell system with anode off-gas recirculation

Sentencas: The manuscript focuses on the various phases of reactor operation during the startup process of the SOFC system.
Titulo: Reforming results of a novel radial reactor for a solid oxide fuel cell system with anode off-gas recirculation

Sentencas: Startup process reforming experiments cover reactor operation points at which it runs on an oxygen to carbon ratio at the reactor inlet (phi(RI)) of 1.2 with air supplied, up to a phi(RI) of 2.4 without air supplied.
Titulo: Reforming results of a novel radial reactor for a solid oxide fuel cell system with anode off-gas recirculation

Sentencas: As confirmed by a Monte Carlo simulation, most of the measured outlet gas concentrations are in or close to equilibrium.
Titulo: Reforming results of a novel radial reactor for a solid oxide fuel cell system with anode off-gas recirculation
